errors.simple: Type mismatch between expected and provided types.
errors.fix:
Check:
• Variable declarations match usage
• Function parameters and returns align
• Interface implementations are complete
• Use type guards for runtime checks
Ensure variables, functions, and imports are declared properly.

Check:
• tsconfig.json paths
• node_modules installation
• Import paths are correct
• Use @types for third-party libs
Add missing properties or make optional.

errors.simple: Value doesn't match any union type.
errors.fix: Use type narrowing or adjust union.

errors.simple: Async function return type doesn't match.

errors.fix: Check for missing semicolons, brackets, or type annotations.

errors.simple: Accessing null or undefined value with strict null checks enabled.
errors.fix: Use optional chaining (?.) or type guards.
